creditline: Gift of Janis Conner and Joel Rosenkranz, New York
description: two horses--taller darker horse behind smaller, lighter horse--with legs behind abstract cross-hatched elements; house in middle ground at left; tall black mountains in background
inscription:
Inscribed in pencil along right edge of sheet: [I  6 1/2 x 11 op  10 1/2 x 15]

Inscribed in blue ink, verso (unknown hand): [Irish Woodblock / J.B.F 1931 (the \"1\" superimposed on a \"0\") Property of / Margherita Flannagan]
provenance: The artist; Margherita La Centra Flannagan (artist's second wife). (Conner-Rosenkranz, New York, until 2011); given to MIA.
signed: Initialed in the block, LLC: [J B F]; initialed and dated in blue ink (unknown hand), verso: [J.B.F. 1931]
title: Untitled (Landscape with Two Horses)
